live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
56322.summary: Some customers in the River Park South area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
56322.title: Dec 20 - Winnipeg (River Park South) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
